## Description {#details}

Information about the stack frame layout on the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> targets.

It holds the direction of the stack growth, the known stack alignment on entry to each function, and the offset to the locals area. See TargetFrameInfo for more comments.

Definition at line 26 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuframelowering-h">AMDGPUFrameLowering.h</a>.
